name: 高得畬
objective:
*Memories

    -RAM & ROM
    -DFT, MEM BIST

*Packaging
*ALU design
    -Adders
    -Multiplier
*Backend Design

    -Special Net
    -Misc.

*Examples
schedule:
week / date / topics
01. 02/26/21 Chapter 5 (Memory types, Set-up & hold time)

05. 03/26/21 (QZ1)Chapter 5 (Sequential machine, State graph)

08. 04/16/21 Midterm Examination

17. 06/18/21 Final Examination

scorePolicy:
Two quizzes 30% (15% for each)
Midterm 35%
Final 35%
